title: Grasping the Power of Forgiveness, Part 1
itunes:author: Guests: Al & Lisa Robertson
itunes:summary: Choosing forgiveness instead of resentment can bring healing to your marriage. It's not easy, but through God's grace, you can do it. John and Greg explain how walking in forgiveness can strengthen the relationship with your spouse. Receive the book Desperate Forgiveness with your gift of any amount.
